trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents a memory-mapped file.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx x xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the file handle of a memory-mapped file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxx xx x xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The handle to the memory-mapped file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Creates a memory-mapped file from an existing file with the specified access mode, name, inheritability, and capacity.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx$ xxxx$ xxxxxxxxxxxxxx$ xxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The file stream of the existing file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A name to assign to the memory-mapped file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The maximum size, in bytes, to allocate to the memory-mapped file.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxx$ xx xxxxx$ xx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Specify 0 to set the capacity to the size of filestream.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxxxxx 0 xx xxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx $xx$xxxxxxxxxx$$xx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A memory-mapped file that has the specified characteristics.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: fileStream is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxXxxxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Creates a memory-mapped file from a file on disk.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx xxxx x xxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The path to file to map.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxx xx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A memory-mapped file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: path is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An I/O error occurred.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx X$X xxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\npath exceeds the maximum length defined by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxx$$xx$ xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
In Windows, paths must contain fewer than 248 characters, and file names must contain fewer than 260 characters.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx Xxxxxxx$ xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx 000 xxxxxxxxxx$ xxx xxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx 000 xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The caller does not have the required permissions for the file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

\n

capacity is zero, and the size of the file on disk is also zero.

trans-unit.source: If opening an existing file, the capacity, options, and memory arguments will be ignored.

\n

A stream of memory that has the specified offset and size.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
offset or size is a negative value.

-or-

size is greater than the logical address space.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xx $xx$xxxx$$xx$ xx x xxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$$x$xx$xxxx$$xx$ xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Access to the memory-mapped file is unauthorized.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: size is greater than the total virtual memory.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxx$$xx$ xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Creates a stream that maps to a view of the memory-mapped file, and that has the specified offset, size, and access type.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxxxx xxxx xxxx xx x xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx$ xxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx$ xxxx$ xxx xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The byte at which to start the view.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The size of the view.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Specify 0 (zero) to create a view that starts at offset and ends approximately at the end of the memory-mapped file.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxxxxx 0 $xxxx$ xx xxxxxx x xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xx $xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A stream of memory that has the specified characteristics.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: access is invalid for the memory-mapped file.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
size is greater than the total virtual memory.

-or-

access is invalid for the memory-mapped file.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxx$$xx$ xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ntrue to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Opens an existing memory-mapped file that has the specified name in system memory.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the memory-mapped file to open.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A memory-mapped file that has the specified name.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source: mapName is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxXxxx$$xx$ xx xx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: mapName is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxXxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The file specified for mapName does not exist.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx $xx$xxxXxxx$$xx$ xxxx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Opens an existing memory-mapped file that has the specified name and access rights in system memory.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the memory-mapped file to open.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

One of the enumeration values that specifies the access rights to apply to the memory-mapped file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A memory-mapped file that has the specified characteristics.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: mapName is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxXxxx$$xx$ xx xx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: mapName is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxXxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The file specified for mapName does not exist.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx $xx$xxxXxxx$$xx$ xxxx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Opens an existing memory-mapped file that has the specified name, access rights, and inheritability in system memory.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx$ xxxxxx xxxxxx$ xxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the memory-mapped file to open.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

One of the enumeration values that specifies the access rights to apply to the memory-mapped file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A memory-mapped file that has the specified characteristics.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: mapName is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxXxxx$$xx$ xx xx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

\n

The requested access is invalid for the memory-mapped file.
